Item.Name: Draught of Glibness
Item.Description: A bottle filled with a strange blue goop. Don't tell me you're gonna drink this?

Item.Name: Draught of Vivaciousness
Item.Description: A bottle filled with an effervescent red substance. It looks like it's alive.

Item.Name: Suit of Silver
Item.Description: A resplendent suit of silver. Don't look too closely at it or you might go blind.

Item.Name: Double-breasted Suit
Item.Description: If suits were sentient and able to form a military, you're pretty sure this one would be the general.

Item.Name: Corduroy Suit
Item.Description: Nothing screams erudition like padded elbows.

Item.Name: Snakeskin Briefcase
Item.Description: With this briefcase, no one will notice how ignorant you are--they'll be too distracted by all the red paint.

Item.Name: Mighty Microphone
Item.Description: A powerfully amped microphone, guaranteed to make sure you're the loudest idiot in the room.

Item.Name: Pipe of Plato
Item.Description: The fumes coming from this will make even your most stalwart enemies faint in submission.

Item.Name: Leisure Shoes of Commonness
Item.Description: Stylish, comfy, and delightfully bourgeois. Show those middle-classers that you can connect with them.

Item.Name: Polished Boots
Item.Description: Clean, intimidating, and slightly reminiscent of your days in the war.

Item.Name: Tidy-looking Oxfords
Item.Description: Not to be confused with the shirts, of course.

Item.Name: Literal Military Commendation
Item.Description: The name kinda says it all.

Item.Name: Dazzling Power Tie
Item.Description: The bold, bright crimson of this tie consumes all else surrounding it.

Item.Name: Spectacles of Magnification
Item.Description: Well, what else would spectacles do?

Item.Name: Thinkin' Cap
Item.Description: Distinct and yet, in its wornness, relatable.

Item.Name: Crumpled Fedora
Item.Description: Haven't we, as a society, gotten past this meme yet?

Item.Name: Spiked Helmet
Item.Description: Calm down, there, Kaiser Wilhelm. No one's at war just yet. Yet.
